import React, { ReactNode } from 'react'; import Head from 'next/head'; type Props = { children?: ReactNode; title?: string; }; const Layout: React.FC = ({ children, title }) => ( {title}
Araka
  • Merchants
  • Pricing
  • About
  • English Français
  • Sign in

Fast and secure payment platform for the internet

Araka is a payment platform that allows any registered user make payment for goods and services, it also allows merchants registered on it to accept online payments for goods and services with cards and mobile money wallets M-PESA • AirtelMoney and OrangeMoney

Easy for your clients

A fully integrated suite of payment products

We bring together everything that is required to make and accept payments and send payouts globally. Araka powers payments for utility providers • telecommunication providers • private merchants and everything in between,

We are equipped to assist you begin transacting your business online. We help merchants beat fraud • send invoices • create quick payment pages and som much more!

{/* {children} */} ); export default Layout;
